title: Why can't I see the inventory in my world?
self_text: Hi, I am new to Minecraft and I have been trying to play with friends for a while but whenever I join their worlds, I cannot open any chests or furnaces or anything that has an inventory. Is there something wrong with my game or is it just me? Any help would be appreciated!

title: How to build a mob farm with low resources?
self_text: I have a world where I can only craft the most basic tools, and nothing else (no furnace, stone pickaxe, etc). Is there any way I could still make a mob farm that doesn't require these things?

title: Can you play on a realm with a friend that is banned?
self_text: I got banned from the realm, and my friend wants me to join again but they said it would be an invite only so i cant join back in. Is there any way to get around it like maybe he can change the settings for me or something?  I dont want him to lose his realm though

title: No texture pack is loading for me (1.20.1)
self_text: I've tried everything, but no matter what texture pack I try to load, it doesn't show up in the resource packs menu. I am using a Windows 10 computer.  I have even tried reinstalling Minecraft and still nothing works.  Any help would be appreciated!

self_text: I have been trying for hours and i always end up getting killed by the hoglings. Is there a way to go around them? Or just kill them?

self_text: I am looking for a seed that has villages and a few mountains near spawn, preferably without an ocean nearby. It's okay if there are some dangerous mobs, but it would be nice if there wasn't a dungeon or mineshaft immediately in front of my house.

I am using a Realms subscription so that we can play together, but no matter what we try, it just won't work. Is there anything that I could do to fix this?

Do you have any favorite features or things you’re looking forward to trying out?

title: I need help with a modded server!

I've followed several tutorials online, but I'm still getting errors when I try to start the server.   I've installed Forge, all the mods, and configured the server properties file. However, when I run the server, it crashes with an error message that says "java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/world/level/block/state/BlockStateList".   I've tried searching for solutions online, but haven't found anything that works. Has anyone else encountered this issue? If so, how did you fix it?   Thanks in advance for your help!

title: A weird bug with the new command block syntax
self_text: I'm trying to get a custom command block function to work, but it keeps giving me an error message that says "Invalid argument" when I try to execute it.  I've checked my syntax multiple times, and I can't figure out what's wrong.   Here is the code:  ```json { "function": "my_custom_function", "arguments": [ "10", "20", "30" ] } ```  The error message appears even if I just type in "execute as @a run function my_custom_function".  Is there something I'm missing?  Thanks for any help!
